properties.entry: SELECT QNA_NO, CATEGORY_NM, QNA_TITLE, ANSWER, MEMBER_NM FROM QNA_BOARD JOIN CATEGORY_TYPE USING(CATEGORY_CD) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ADMIN_ACCOUNT USING(ADMIN_NO) ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT CATEGORY_NM,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_NM,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YY/MM/DD') FROM BOARD INNER JOIN BOARD_TYPE ON(BOARD_TYPE=BOARD_CD) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_TYPE ON(CATEGORY_TYPE=CATEGORY_CD) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE=1 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
